CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 3.0)

SET(CMAKE_C_STANDARD 99)
SET(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -O0 -g")

OPTION(TEST "Build all tests." ON)

SUBDIRS(libsmmr)
SUBDIRS(test)
SUBDIRS(example/client_server)

IF (UNIX AND NOT APPLE)
    SET(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -D__WDIR__")
    SET(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -D__WDIR__")
ENDIF()

ENABLE_TESTING()
